app.title: My Expenses AI
settings.title: Personal Settings
settings.profile.complete: Complete your info from the onboarding screen.
settings.profile.avatar_hint: Pick the emoji that represents you best.
settings.profile.name_required: Please enter a valid name before saving.
settings.profile.updated: Your profile info has been updated.
settings.theme.title: Dark mode
settings.theme.subtitle: Switch between light and dark whenever you want.
settings.language.title: Preferred language
settings.language.subtitle: Choose the language you want to use in the app.
settings.currencies.subtitle: Add or edit currencies from a dedicated screen.
settings.currencies.empty_state: You haven't added any currencies yet. Use the add action to configure them.
settings.currencies.empty_list:
No currencies added yet.
Use the button above to pick them.
settings.ai.title: AI insights (Gemini)
settings.ai.subtitle: Enable Gemini-powered analysis for deeper insights when you are online.
settings.ai.status.enabled: AI insights are active and will refresh automatically.
settings.ai.status.disabled: AI insights are currently turned off.
settings.ai.key_missing: Add your Gemini key inside api_keys.dart to activate.
settings.ai.offline_note: Requires an internet connection to generate insights.
settings.textscale.title: Text size
settings.textscale.subtitle: Adjust typography to fit your screen comfortably.
settings.textscale.helper: These settings affect all screens so content looks great on every phone size.
settings.reminders.title: Notifications & reminders
settings.reminders.subtitle: Enable local reminders so you never forget to log expenses or review budgets.
settings.reminders.enabled: Local alerts will fire at the scheduled times.
settings.help.title: Need a quick reminder?
settings.help.subtitle: Highlights on how to get the best out of My Expenses.
settings.help.tip_wallets: Create multiple wallets (cash, bank, digital) and log each transaction in the correct wallet.
settings.help.tip_goals: Define clear savings goals and track the completion percentage here and in the goals screen.
settings.help.tip_backup: Take a local backup from time to timeâ€”you can share or restore it whenever needed.
settings.help.sheet_desc: Keep these core tips in mind to stay organized every day.
settings.help.detail_wallets: From the wallets tab you can add wallets with different currencies and set their starting balances.
settings.help.detail_ai: Enable smart insights from settings to get savings tips and a monthly overview.
settings.help.detail_security: Use the app lock and local backups to protect your privacy and recover data quickly.
settings.help.detail_support: You can always revisit the onboarding screens or contact us via the notification center for feedback.
goals.overview.title: Goals snapshot
goals.overview.empty: Start by creating your first goal and track every saving move.
goals.empty.title: No goals yet
goals.empty.subtitle: Set a clear target, then use wallets and savings transactions to move closer to it.
goals.guide.title: How to use financial goals
goals.guide.step1: Define a clear goal with a target amount and due date.
goals.guide.step2: Link savings transactions or wallets so the current amount updates automatically.
goals.guide.step3: Use reminders to stay on track and avoid missing the deadline.
goals.guide.step4: Review the dashboard to celebrate progress and unlock the next goal.
goals.form.validation.name: Please enter a descriptive goal name.
goals.form.validation.wallet: Choose the wallet associated with this goal.
goals.form.wallet_hint: The wallet currency is used to track progress.
goals.form.wallet_missing: Add a wallet first to create a savings goal.
goals.wallet.pending: A dedicated wallet will be created once the goal is complete.
goals.contribution.invalid: Enter a valid amount before saving.
goals.details.title: Goal timeline
goals.details.info.title: Reading this dashboard
goals.details.info.body: Every contribution you log appears here with the deadline, target amount, and running balance. The chart highlights the speed of your savings, while the activity log lists every entry with its timestamp and note.
goals.details.goal_missing: We couldn't find this goal. Please reopen it from the goals list.
goals.details.chart.title: Progress chart
goals.details.chart.empty: No contributions yet. Add your first deposit to see the curve.
goals.details.timeline.title: Activity log
goals.details.timeline.empty:
No saved activity for this goal yet.
Start with a contribution to see it here.
goals.archived.title: Archived goals
goals.archived.subtitle: @count completed goals
goals.transfer.title: Transfer savings
goals.transfer.subtitle: Pick the wallet that should receive the saved amount.
goals.transfer.error: Couldn't transfer the savings. Please try again.
goals.transfer.no_wallets: No wallets available. Create one first.
goals.transfer.archived: Savings were moved to a wallet. This goal is now read-only.
goals.insights.title: Goal tracker
goals.insights.subtitle: Quick view of active vs archived goals
goals.insights.no_active: No active goals at the moment. Create one to show up here.
goals.celebration.title: Great job! Goal completed ğŸ‰
goals.celebration.subtitle: You finished the "@name" goal.
goals.celebration.message: The full amount @amount is now stored in your dedicated savings wallet. Enjoy the win and plan your next milestone.
dashboard.goals.title: Savings goals
dashboard.goals.subtitle: Stay on track toward your closest milestone.
dashboard.goals.empty:
You don't have any active goals yet.
Create one and we'll track it here.
settings.reminders.empty:
No reminders yet.
Use the add button to schedule your first alert.
settings.reminders.delete_confirm: This reminder will be removed permanently. Continue?
settings.reminders.validation: Please write a reminder message before saving.
securityCardSubtitle: Protect your data with an app lock and offline backups.
securityLockHint: Require a PIN code whenever the app opens.
securityLockDisableTitle: Enter your PIN to disable the lock
securityLockHelper: Activate the lock to use biometrics and advanced privacy features.
backupCardSubtitle: Create an offline copy of your data or restore an older snapshot.
backupRestoreSuccess: Backup restored. Data will refresh shortly.
backupCreateError: Could not create a backup. Try again.
backupShareError: Unable to share the backup file.
backupOpenFolderError: Couldn't open the folder. Please try again via your file manager.
backupDeleteConfirm: This backup file will be removed permanently. Continue?
backupOptionTitle: Where do you want to save the backup?
backupNameDescription: Use something descriptive so you can remember what this copy contains. Leave it blank to use the default name.
backupNameHelper: Optional â€” we'll fall back to an automatic name if empty.
backupNameRequired: Please provide a backup name before continuing.
backupAutoHint: Weâ€™ll save a copy of your data on a schedule so nothing gets lost.
backup.auto.success_body: We stored a backup named @path. Youâ€™re all set.
backup.auto.error_body: Please check your storage and try again.
savingsReports.title: Smart saving opportunities
savingsReports.subtitle: See where you can trim spending for each wallet this month.
savingsReports.tip: Trim @amount from @category this week to stay on track.
transactions.insufficientFunds: This wallet doesnâ€™t have enough balance for that amount. Please add funds first.
transactions.save_error: We couldn't save this transaction, please try again.
transaction.receipt_hint: A secure copy will be stored inside the app after saving this transaction.
transactions.category_required: Please pick a category before saving this transaction.
transactions.type.title: Transaction type
transactions.goal.label: Savings goal
transactions.goal.empty: No goals are linked to this wallet yet.
transactions.goal.create: Open the goals screen to add one
transactions.goal.required: Select a goal to record this saving.
transactions.goal.currency_mismatch: Goal currency doesn't match the selected wallet currency.
transactions.saving.category_helper: Savings are grouped in a special category linked to your goals.
transactions.saving.hint: The amount will move from the selected wallet into the goal's savings wallet.
transaction.no_receipt: No receipt attached for this transaction.

cashflow.subtitle: Track incoming vs outgoing money for each wallet with the projected balance.

billBook.title: Bill book
billBook.empty: No shared bills yet. Start by creating one for your next gathering.
billBook.sectionSubtitle: Group expenses, split them easily, and keep a history of every gathering.
quickNote.title: Quick note
tasks.title: Recurring tasks
tasks.empty: No recurring tasks yet. Record the payments you repeat every week or month.
tasks.sectionSubtitle: Track bills you repeat every week or month and get reminders.

settings.categories.subtitle: Organize categories from a dedicated screen.
securityOverlaySubtitle: Enter your PIN to continue. Your budgets stay safe even offline.
